long_description: With lightweight fabric that wicks moisture and dries quickly to help keep you cool and comfortable, the women's Marmot Impulse 3/4 Tights let you enjoy your favorite running trails to the fullest. Mesh panels behind knees enhance breathability. Fabric helps protects skin from harsh sunlight with a UPF factor of 30. Gusset features a quick-drying, highly breathable CoolMax(R) polyester fabric patch. Back pocket with zippered closure stashes small workout essentials. Reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light. The women's Marmot Impulse 3/4 tights feature a 17 in. inseam and an athletic, next-to-skin fit.
short_description: With lightweight fabric that wicks moisture and dries quickly to help keep you cool and comfortable, the women's Marmot Impulse 3/4 Tights let you enjoy your favorite running trails to the fullest.
